item.description:
Dear Westborough Spirituality Meetup member,

How are you?

Summer is here! We all like going out and having fun.

 

I found out everyone has been interested in the topic about meditation. There are so many kind of meditations such as sitting, chanting, dancing, walking and breathing. What is the purpose that we are doing it? What is the goal about meditation?

 

Share your experience with each other. If you like to learn more about meditation, this is right meetup for you. We can learn from each other. You can learn which way is best for you

 

It is summer time, if weather is good, we can all take a walk after meetup.

Look forward to meeting you all

    Jonathan

This is a interesting youtube for you. Personally I don't think killing a fly is good idea!

 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9l-YYqjhVi4

So you may get a basic idea about meditation!!
item.how_to_find_us: When you drive into condos, the second building on your right. park any place with visit parking sign on it. Door bell #19
item.name: Westborough Spiritual July Meetup about Meditation
